name: WindStone (pometcan)
description:
History “Windstone” is an atmospheric puzzle game where one plays as a lost soul finding themselves on an unknown set of floating islands. To achieve what we are looking for, the player has to find a way to obtain the keys. What awaits us behind the ancient door? There is only one way to find out.  Credits  GAME DESIGN
